item.title: About
item.description: data scientist and architect for artificial intelligence-infused systems at Microsoft with extensive hands-on experience ranging from envisioning and scoping use cases to data analysis, machine learning model development, and production deployment.

item.title: resume
item.description: long story short data scientist and architect for artificial intelligence-infused systems at Microsoft with extensive hands-on experience ranging from envisioning and scoping use cases to data analysis, machine learning model development, and production deployment. professional experience 2021/11 - today machine learning engineer; the boston consulting group (bcg), copenhagen (denmark) part of consulting services working with strategic enterprise customers scoped and developed multiple artificial intelligence-infused systems and tools, focused on machine learning and software engineering 2018/10 - 2021/11 delivery data scientist; microsoft, berlin (germany) part of consulting services working with strategic enterprise customers
